article_text: Now that the elections have passed, lawmakers going to Washington, D.C., and Topeka in 2015 should read a Kansas City area report released this year on the untreated costs of mental illness.

article_metadata.title: Lewis W. Diuguid: Untreated mental illness costing state | The Wichita Eagle
